name: Eurasian BODY WAVE (100% Virgin Unprocessed) *THIS HAIR COMES IN NATURAL COLOR AND IS NOT SOLD RED*
description:
*****IMPORTANT***** PLEASE READ ALL PRODUCT DESCRIPTION DETAILS AND PURCHASE NUMBER OF BUNDLES ACCORDING TO RECOMMENDATIONS IN TEXT ACCORDING TO LENGTH.

Eurasian hair is the virgin hair product result from women that are mixed of European and Asian ancestry. The mixture of these two origins gives the hair a full lightweight bodied luscious smooth texture of hair that does not tangle or matt. 100% Virgin Unprocessed Eurasian Hair is becoming one of hair extensions new hot and popular commodities. However, due to the exclusiveness of this particular grade of hair, there’s are often only limited amounts of donor batches available. We are proud to say we will strive to keep healthy consistent stock of this hair option as long as it is being made available for sale. 

This texture is just like the rest of our high quality PREMIUM SELECTED VIRGIN EURASIAN HAIR OPTIONS but in a classic body wave pattern.  This hair is soft, ultra sleek, super smooth to the touch with a medium healthy natural luster slightly higher than most other origins of virgin hair we offer making it ideal for bleaching and high pigment custom coloring. It's full of natural body movement to keep it naturally looking effortless gorgeous and cooperative with unlimited styling options of curling with and without heat. The medium luster gives it just enough shine to not look processed and artificial but eliminates the need for excessive oily product use such as argan oil and other oil based products if the initial co-wash and deep conditioning  process is thorough and sufficient. You'll want to stick to minimal product use in-between regular cowashing and deep conditioning and styling products should all be lightweight or weightless formulas. (Our product recommendations are included in an insert with every hair order we ship) This texture curls with ease on medium and high temps and holds curls extremely well with no added product assistance. The blend of this silky smooth and ultra sleek texture is similar to the perfect blend of Peruvian and Malaysian Textures in one. If you're looking for an easy low maintenance hair with great recovery and versatility you can't go wrong with a eurasian hair selection that is naturally this gorgeous.

This hair like all authentic unprocessed Virgin Hair can be flat ironed,curled, colored darker or bleached lighter in color. Please keep in mind that heat protectant when heat styling any virgin hair is highly recommended and deep conditioning must follow bleaching and coloring hair for best results. This virgin hair like most virgin hair does occasionally show natural color hair inconsistencies but for the most part is a range of medium to dark brown ranging comparable to a beauty supply color classification of 1b-2 in it's natural unprocessed color.
All cuticles are aligned and in tact in the same direction so hair has minimal shedding and is tangle free with proper care and maintenance.

***CHART BELOW IS STRICTLY FOR REFERENCE ONLY BASED 
OFF OUR GENERAL EVALUATION OF THIS HAIR AND IS NOT MANDATORY. YOU MAY PURCHASE WHATEVER AMOUNT YOU WISH 
BE IT MORE OR LESS. KEEP IN MIND THE AMOUNT OF HAIR 
RECOMMENDED FROM OUR FAMILIARIZATION WITH THE HAIR PRODUCT IS YOUR BEST ADVISORY ON HOW MANY BUNDLES GENERALLY SHOULD BE PURCHASED FOR A STANDARD FULL HEAD INSTALL. AMOUNT NEEDED WILL ALSO DEPEND UPON THE METHOD OF INSTALL AND METHOD OF CLOSURE. THE REFERENCE CHART BELOW GIVES MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS REFERRALS ONLY FOR STANDARD FULL SEW-IN OR WIG UNIT COMPOSITIONS. IF FULLER LOOKS ARE DESIRED YOU CAN PURCHASE MORE HAIR ACCORDING TO PERSONAL PREFERENCE.***

Lengths: 
12"-18" - 3 BUNDLES MINIMUM 
20"-24" - 4 BUNDLES MINIMUM 
26"-28" - 5-6 BUNDLES MINIMUM OR MORE AS DESIRED

***PRICES ARE PER SINGLE BUNDLE ACCORDING TO THE RESPECTIVE LENGTH LISTED AND SHOWN***

*If you are having a u-part or full wig unit composed by fly honey wigs or if you simply desire a matching closure please select the SILK BODY WAVE lace closure within one of our JUST LACE CLOSURES listings for the best match and blend to this hair option.*

NEVER HESITATE TO CONTACT US WITH PRODUCT INQUIRIES 
*****PLEASE SEE OUR COMPLETE DETAILED ORDER PROCESSING AND SHIPPING POLICIES PRIOR TO COMPLETING ANY PURCHASE TRANSACTIONS. SUCCESSFUL TRANSACTIONS ARE ASSUMED TO BE ACCEPTED PROVIDED YOU HAVE MADE YOURSELF FAMILIAR WITH ALL RESPECTIVE INFORMATION PERTAINING TO PURCHASE POLICIES, TERMS AND CONDITIONS ETC. ALL POLICIES AND PROCEDURES ARE STRICTLY ADHERED TO.*****

name: Eurasian Textured Straight (100% Virgin Unprocessed)
description:
*****IMPORTANT***** PLEASE READ ALL PRODUCT DESCRIPTION DETAILS AND PURCHASE NUMBER OF BUNDLES ACCORDING TO RECOMMENDATIONS IN TEXT ACCORDING TO LENGTH.

Eurasian Textured Straight, is the virgin hair product result from women that are mixed of European and Asian ancestry. The mixture of these two origins gives the hair a full lightweight bodied luscious smooth texture of hair that does not tangle or matt. 100% Virgin Unprocessed Eurasian Hair is becoming one of hair extensions new hot and popular commodities. However, due to the exclusiveness of this particular grade of hair, there’s are often only limited amounts of donor batches available. We are proud to say we will strive to keep healthy consistent stock of this hair option as long as it is being made available for sale. 

This texture is not like our Brazilian Natural Straight and instead of the term "textured" usually and typically being referenced in regards to more coarse  and super thick cuticle textures, this textured straight is ultra sleek and super smooth to the touch with a medium even healthy luster slightly higher than our Brazilian Natural Straight making it ideal for ultra lighter color bleaching and for longer flowy hairstyles. It's lightweight enough to handle longer lengths for more than standard amount of bundle installs and its full of natural body movement to keep it naturally looking ultra feminine and sexy. The medium luster gives it just enough shine to not look processed and artificial but eliminates the need for excessive oily product such as argan oil and other oil based products if the initial co-wash and deep conditioning  process is thorough and sufficient. You'll want to stick to minimal product use in-between regular cowashing and deep conditioning and styling products should all be lightweight or weightless formulas. (Our product recommendations are included in an insert with every hair order we ship) This texture curls with ease on medium and high temps and holds curls extremely well with no added product assistance. The blend of this silky smooth and ultra sleek texture is similar to the perfect blend of Peruvian and Malaysian Textures in one. If you're looking for an easy low maintenance hair with great recovery and versatility you can't go wrong with a straight texture that is naturally this gorgeous.

This hair like all authentic unprocessed Virgin Hair can be flat ironed,curled, colored darker or bleached lighter in color. Please keep in mind that heat protectant when heat styling any virgin hair is highly recommended and deep conditioning must follow bleaching and coloring hair for best results. This virgin hair like most virgin hair does occasionally show natural color hair inconsistencies but for the most part is a range of medium to dark brown in it's natural unprocessed color.
All cuticles are aligned and in tact in the same direction so hair has minimal shedding and is tangle free with proper care and maintenance.

***CHART BELOW IS STRICTLY FOR REFERENCE ONLY BASED 
OFF OUR GENERAL EVALUATION OF THIS HAIR AND IS NOT MANDATORY. YOU MAY PURCHASE WHATEVER AMOUNT YOU WISH 
BE IT MORE OR LESS. KEEP IN MIND THE AMOUNT OF HAIR 
RECOMMENDED FROM OUR FAMILIARIZATION WITH THE HAIR PRODUCT IS YOUR BEST ADVISORY ON HOW MANY BUNDLES GENERALLY SHOULD BE PURCHASED FOR A STANDARD FULL HEAD INSTALL. IF FULLER LOOKS ARE DESIRED YOU CAN PURCHASE MORE HAIR ACCORDING TO PERSONAL PREFERENCE.***

name: BRAZILIAN DEEP CURLY (textured and slightly coarse)
description:
The Karaezy Kouture Virgin Brazilian DEEP CURLY Hair is 100% Virgin Hair and is an extremely textured slightly coarse curly hair. It's high quality top grade unprocessed human hair offered through Karaezy Kouture with a gorgeous pattern that is ideal for picking out and getting a bigger volume filled natural textured look.  The Remy  aligned one directional cuticles proves that this hair can have a decent longevity in life span  when properly cared for and maintained and experiences minimal shedding or tangling despite it's curly and slightly coarse texture which is rare for similar textured hair and curl patterns! Available in lengths from 14 inches up to 24 inches. This hair is has never been chemically processed in anyway.  THIS HAIR IS EXTREMELY TEXTURED and is not recommended if you are looking for a silky sleek look. This is a soft deep slightly coarse natural looking texture and like most  authentic virgin hair  it does require deep conditioning and must be cowashed regularly to free it of dirt and debris that will weight it down and prevent its full styling potential. It is a favorite of both natural and relaxed patrons.  The hair is reasonably priced...processes,ships, and is delivered within a 7-10 business days or less period and is sure to become one of your newest favorite textured patterns. Contact Karaezy Kouture with your inquiries and we'd be happy to answer any additional questions you may have before purchasing and then proceed to place your order today!

!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! WE HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS HAIR FOR U-PART OR FULL WIG WITH LACE CLOSURE UNIT INSTALLS. CONTACT FLY HONEY WIGS for the best and most affordable custom unit with the best curl pattern preservation. CONTACT: flyhoneywigs@yahoo.com for a full detailed information attachment. PLEASE PURCHASE THE BRAZILIAN DEEP WAVE CURL CLOSURE IF HAVING A WIG UNIT COMPOSED WITH THIS HAIR.

-THIS HAIR IS AVAILABLE ONLY IN IT'S NATURAL COLOR WHICH IS COMPARABLE TO A 1b-2 IN TYPICAL BEAUTY SUPPLY STORE HAIR. HAIR CAN BE COLORED TO ANY DESIRED COLOR.
*be advised that hair is no longer virgin once colored and must be maintained the same as colored natural hair with color safe deep conditioning care conditioners*

- ALL VIRGIN BRAZILIAN HAIR OFFERED THROUGH KARAEZY KOUTURE CAN BE STRAIGHTENED COMPLETELY AND WILL REVERT OR ATTEMPT TO REVERT AFTER BEING WASHED BUT IT IS NOT RECOMMENDED TO COMPLETELY STRAIGHTEN EXTREMELY TEXTURED OR TIGHTER CURLY HAIRS.
*please keep in mind hair that is completely straightened repeatedly will slightly loosen the wave pattern over time*

-EACH BUNDLE IS 3.5 OUNCES! THE LONGER THE LENGTH THE LESS IN WEFT LENGTH (THAT DOES NOT INDICATE LESS HAIR OVERALL) TO MAKE THE BUNDLE THE APPROPRIATE WEIGHT SO COMPENSATE ACCORDINGLY TO YOUR DESIRED LOOK WHEN PURCHASING. ANY FULL HEAD LOOK WITH LENGTHS OVER 18 INCHES  IN THIS PARTICULAR HAIR MAY REQUIRE ADDITIONAL BUNDLES OVER THE STANDARD AMOUNT OF 3 BUNDLES.
YOU MAY REFER TO THE CHART BELOW FOR HOW MANY BUNDLES SHOULD BE PURCHASED ACCORDING TO YOUR DESIRED LENGTHS

14"-18" - 3 BUNDLES MINIMUM
20"-24" - 4 BUNDLES MINIMUM
26" and up - 5 BUNDLES MINIMUM AND UP 

*SEALING YOUR WEFT IS RECOMMENDED FOR PRESERVING THE LONGEVITY OF YOUR VIRGIN HAIR PURCHASE AND HELPS IT WITHSTAND MULTIPLE USE ONLY IF YOU ARE USING THE HAIR IN TRADITIONAL SEW-IN INSTALLATIONS. IT IS NOT ALWAYS NECESSARY FOR THE PREFERRED METHOD OF  U-PART OR FULL WIG INSTALLATION. THIS HAIR IS NOT RECOMMENDED FOR THOSE NOT FAMILIAR WITH DEALING WITH EXTREMELY TEXTURED OR CURLY HAIR CARE AND MAINTENANCE. DEEP CONDITIONING IS MANDATORY FOR ALL VIRGIN HAIR PRIOR TO INSTALLNG FOR BEST RESULTS*

***PLEASE SEE AND BE FAMILIAR WITH OUR FULL PURCHASE POLICY DETAILS AVAILBLE FOR VIEW ONLINE IN THE ABOUT US SECTION AT www.karaezykouture.com***

name: Eurasian Natural Wavy (100% Virgin Unprocessed)
description:
Eurasian Natural Wavy, is the virgin hair product result from women that are mixed of European and Asian ancestry. The mixture of these two origins gives the hair a full bodied luscious smooth texture of hair that does not tangle or matt. 100% Virgin Unprocessed Eurasian Hair is becoming one of hair extensions new hot and popular commodities. However, due to the exclusiveness of this particular grade of hair, there’s are often only limited amounts of donor batches available. We are proud to say we will strive to keep healthy consistent stock of this hair option as long as it is being made available for sale.

This hair like all authentic unprocessed Virgin Hair can be flat ironed,curled, colored darker or bleached lighter in color. Please remember that excessive heat and/or color can/will result in reduction of its natural curl pattern and the wave/curl pattern of this particular hair can vary from one bundle to the next in the tightness of the wave pattern. These are natural virgin hair inconsistencies common in authentic virgin unprocessed hair along with natural color variations. The color of this hair ranges from an off black to dark natural brown and often with slightly medium lighter brown ends. 

Each bundle of hair is approximately 3.2-3.5 ounces each. The amount of hair needed for install will vary upon length of hair and the look you desire and often the method of install you choose. We recommend referring to the general reference below to ensure you purchase enough hair for your desired look. Any unused hair can always be saved and used later for possible future install and it is always better to have and not need than need and not have.
Normal stock for this hair extension option is available in lengths 12"- 28" when available and listed below in the drop box selection options.
This chemically unprocessed hair maintains a
beautiful medium - low luster and natural shine. Hair is
Remy so all cuticles are in tact and aligned in
the same direction so hair has minimal shedding and
is tangle free with proper care and maintenance. 

***CHART BELOW IS STRICTLY FOR REFERENCE ONLY BASED
OFF OUR GENERAL EVALUATION OF THIS HAIR AND IS NOT MANDATORY. YOU MAY PURCHASE WHATEVER AMOUNT YOU WISH
BE IT MORE OR LESS. KEEP IN MIND THE AMOUNT OF HAIR
RECOMMENDED FROM OUR FAMILIARIZATION WITH THE HAIR PRODUCT IS YOUR BEST ADVISORY ON HOW MANY BUNDLES GENERALLY SHOULD BE PURCHASED FOR A STANDARD FULL HEAD INSTALL. AMOUNT NEEDED WILL ALSO DEPEND UPON THE METHOD OF INSTALL AND METHOD OF CLOSURE. THE REFERENCE CHART BELOW GIVES MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS REFERRALS ONLY FOR STANDARD FULL SEW-IN OR WIG UNIT COMPOSITIONS. IF FULLER LOOKS ARE DESIRED YOU CAN PURCHASE MORE HAIR ACCORDING TO PERSONAL PREFERENCE.***

Lengths:
12"-18" - 3 BUNDLES MINIMUM
20"-24" - 4 BUNDLES MINIMUM
26"-28" - 5-6 BUNDLES MINIMUM OR MORE AS DESIRED

***PRICES ARE PER SINGLE BUNDLE ACCORDING TO THE RESPECTIVE LENGTH LISTED AND SHOWN***

*If you are having a u-part or full wig unit composed by fly honey wigs you may choose our natural or loose wavy closure or any standard natural color wavy closure and it will blend.*

name: Virgin Brazilian Soft Body Wave ***BEST SELLING***
description:
The Karaezy Kouture Virgin Brazilian Soft Body Wave is a Top Grade Remy Hair  that is 100% Virgin Unprocessed Hair and is  with a gorgeous soft wave pattern with Remy full cuticles aligned and in tact in one direction making it a minimal shedding and tangling extension. Hair has a 1 year life span minimum and possibly longer when properly cared for and maintained and is ideal for heat curling and styling!  Hair straightens smooth and curls easily and holds curls and waves from both curling wands and irons as well as flexi-rod sponge rollers. Available in length range 12 inches all the way up to 34 inches according to stock and listed below in the selection drop box.  OUR BRAZILIAN SOFT BODY WAVE IS A  NATURAL EXTREMELY TEXTURED BLEND FRIENDLY HAIR with volume and movement. This hair is taken directly from donors who have healthy hair that has never been chemically processed in any way. This hair is soft and easy to manage and blends with almost any hair texture no matter if you are relaxed or natural. BODY WAVE HAIR IS VERY TEXTURED AND FULL OF BODY WHEN STYLED. Like most high quality virgin remy hair it requires consistent deep conditioning and must be cowashed regularly to free it of dirt and debris that will weigh it down preventing its full styling potential. We do not advise heavy product use for best look and styling results. Minimizing product use exclusively to a few HIGH QUALITY products as recommended will keep this hair look it's absolute best! Keep it clean, deep conditioned with a quality compatible conditioner and moisturized appropriately for it to maintain its beautiful natural medium luster.  The hair is reasonably priced...processes, ships, and arrives within 7-10 business days or less and is sure to become one of your favorite curl/wave patterns. 
 Contact Karaezy Kouture with your inquiries and we'll be happy to answer any additional questions you may have before purchasing or you can go ahead and proceed to place your order today!

!!!!! WE HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS HAIR FOR U-PART UNIT INSTALLS AND WE ALSO RECOMMEND SEALING WEFTS IN THE EVENT YOU USE IT FOR A SEWN INSTALL TO ENSURE PRESERVING THE WEFT EXTENSIONS FOR MULTIPLE FUTURE INSTALLS !!!!!

-THIS HAIR IS AVAILABLE ONLY IN IT'S NATURAL COLOR WHICH IS COMPARABLE TO A 1b-2 IN TYPICAL BEAUTY SUPPLY STORE HAIR. HAIR CAN BE COLORED TO ANY DESIRED COLOR. 100% UNPROCESSED  AUTHENTIC VIRGIN HAIR IS INCONSISTENT IN COLOR. It is possible to see dark natural black and dark to medium natural brown and even a combination of both colors per bundle of hair. SINCE THIS HAIR IS 100% VIRGIN UNPROCESSED YOU CAN FEEL FREE TO DARKEN OR BLEACH IT TO PREFERENCE.

*be advised that hair is no longer virgin once colored and must be maintained the same as colored natural hair with color safe deep conditioning care conditioners AND WE RECOMMEND CONSULTING A PROFESSIONAL TO COLOR YOUR BUNDLES IF YOU ARE INEXPERIENCED WITH COLORING HAIR IN ORDER TO NOT COMPROMISE THE QUALITY OR RISK DAMAGE TO YOUR HAIR EXTENSIONS*

- ALL VIRGIN  HAIR OFFERED THROUGH KARAEZY KOUTURE CAN BE STRAIGHTENED COMPLETELY AND WILL REVERT SLIGHTLY AFTER BEING WASHED. WE RECOMMEND AIR DRYING THE HAIR BUNDLES ON A TOWEL FOR BEST REVERT AFTER A REGULAR SHAMPOO OR CO-WASH. IT IS NATURAL FOR THE BODY WAVE TO SLIGHTLY LOOSEN AFTER A CO-WASH  YOU CAN USE HEAT STYLING TOOLS SUCH AS FLAT IRONS, HOT CURLING IRONS, AND HOT ROLLER SETTING TO STYLE THIS HAIR AS YOU PLEASE. HEAT STYLING CAN ALSO BE USED TO ACHIEVE CURLS AND WAVES IN THIS HAIR WITH FLEXI-ROD ROLLERS.
*please keep in mind hair that is completely straightened repeatedly will loosen the wave pattern more over time*

-EACH BUNDLE IS  3.2 - 3.5 OUNCES! THE LONGER THE LENGTH OF THE HAIR, THE LESS LENGTH IN WEFT IN ORDER FOR ALL BUNDLES TO MEASURE ACCURATELY IN WEIGHT RANGE SO COMPENSATE ACCORDINGLY TO YOUR DESIRED LOOK WHEN PURCHASING. ANY FULL HEAD LOOK WITH LENGTHS OVER 20 INCHES MAY REQUIRE ADDITIONAL BUNDLES OVER THE STANDARD AMOUNT OF 3 BUNDLES. 
AS A COURTESY WE HAVE PROVIDED A REFERENCE FOR HOW MANY BUNDLES YOU SHOULD PURCHASE ACCORDING TO LENGTHS. THIS IS OUR RECOMMENDATION FOR AT MINIMUM A FULL NATURAL LOOK. PLEASE FEEL FREE TO PURCHASE MORE BUNDLES AS NEEDED IF YOU DESIRE A FULLER THAN AVERAGE LOOK.

ANY LENGTHS 12" to 20" - PURCHASE 3 BUNDLES MINIMUM
                      22" to 24" -                   4 BUNDLES MINIMUM
                      26"and up -                 5-6                            And UP

*SEALING YOUR WEFT IS RECOMMENDED FOR PRESERVING THE LONGEVITY OF YOUR VIRGIN HAIR PURCHASE AND HELPS IT WITHSTAND MULTIPLE USE BUT IT IS ONLY RECOMMENDED FOR TRADITIONAL SEW-IN INSTALLATION. IT IS NOT NECESSARY WHEN HAVING HAIR SEWN FOR A U-PART OR FULL WIG INSTALL.  REGARDLESS OF INSTALL METHOD, WEFT SEALING IS  OPTIONAL AND NOT MANDATORY. YOU MAY SEAL YOUR OWN WEFTS ONCE YOU RECEIVE YOUR ORDER. WE RETAIL WEFT SEALER HERE ON THIS WEBSITE AS WELL.


--------->PLEASE MAKE SURE YOU REFER TO AND THOROUGHLY READ AND REVIEW TO BECOME FAMILIAR WITH ALL DETAILED ORDER PROCESSING AND SHIPPING AND ANY OTHER RESPECTIVE PURCHASE POLICIES" <--------
       


Please be advised 3 bundles minimum are recommended for a full standard install according to the length recommendations provided in our F.A.Q. page. All prices are the cost per (1) single bundle) unless listed as a layered combination or bundle deal separated with slashes.

MATCHING LACE CLOSURES AVAILABLE PER LENGTH AS PRICE LISTED BELOW. Lace Closures are 4x4 Size with tinted light to medium brown SWISS OR FRENCH lace. 


NEVER HESITATE TO CONTACT US here or our main website if you have any product inquiries, questions, or care and/or maintenance concerns.
*****PLEASE SEE OUR COMPLETE SALES TERMS AND CONDITIONS FOR STORE POLICIES AND PROCEDURES IN THE "ABOUT US" SECTION OF OUR MAIN SITE AT THE DIRECT LINK BELOW
http://www.karaezykouture.com/aboutus.htm

name: Virgin Malaysian SILK Body Wave
description:
If you love the thick full luscious texture of traditional body waves in other types and textures but desire a less coarse textured finish without compromising the density of the hair then you will love our Virgin Malaysian SILK Body Wave. This full thick body wave has an extra SILKY  SMOOTH FINISH and is available in short and longer lengths and is TRUE TO LENGTH for those who love luxurious lengths. This top grade virgin malaysian hair is limited as a specialty selection so stock and length availability will vary at times as listed below in the selection drop box.  
This hair is 100% Virgin Unprocessed so it is only available in its natural off black color and can be be heat curled and straightened, bleached lighter or colored darker to preference.  THIS HAIR COLORS AND BLEACHES EXTREMELY WELL! (See all images for examples)
*please consult professional for coloring virgin hair extensions to not risk compromising texture*

Each bundle of hair is approximately 3.2-3.5 ounces each. The amount of bundles needed will depend on your method of install and personal preference of fullness. You may purchase however many bundles you think will suit your desired look but we have provided a general reference below according to length variations.
3 BUNDLES MINIMUM is recommended for a full head install of any lengths 12"-18"
4 BUNDLES MINIMUM is recommended for a full head install of any lengths 20"-24"
5 BUNDLES or MORE MINIMUM is recommended for a full head install of any lengths  26" and up

**Matching Lace closures for this hair are available in the stock size of
4 x 4" listed in a separate closures listing. Closures are made of durable transparent lace and knots easily bleach when knots are bleached with careful and proper procedure. 
(PLEASE CONSULT A PROFESSIONAL OR EXPERIENCED PERSON WITH KNOT BLEACHING IN ORDER TO NOT DAMAGE OR COMPROMISE THE QUALITY CONSTRUCTION OF YOUR CLOSURE UNIT)

If you desire further details about our purchase and shipping policies please see and observe the tabs listed at the very top and bottom of the website homepage and if you have any product inquiries PLEASE DO NOT HESITATE TO CONTACT US IN ADVANCE prior to completing any purchase transaction. You may utilize the contact option here on the website or email us directly.

name: PERUVIAN BODY WAVY
description:
Our Virgin Peruvian Body Wavy hair is the Sleeker slightly finer textured version of our Best selling Brazilian Body Wave for a more controlled Bodied Texture when cared for properly. 

This Beautiful Virgin Single Donor Remy Hair is absolutely gorgeous and is of GREAT QUALITY. Hair has Remy meaning single direction cuticles in tact, is soft, and is full from weft to tip. It has MINIMAL SHEDDING AND IS TANGLE FREE WITH PROPER CARE AND MAINTENANCE! Weft is neat and well constructed. Hair is 100% Virgin meaning not chemically processed in any way. Hair can be straightened, heat curled, colored, or bleached.

This hair is available in it's natural color only and is comparable to a 1B- 2 blend in comparison to beauty supply store hair. Since hair is 100% virgin unprocessed the natural colors variations within the hair will be inconsistent which is also a common trait in Virgin Hair ***** PLEASE KEEP IN MIND YOU CAN COLOR AND OR BLEACH THE HAIR TO COLOR PREFERENCE. *Please consult a professional in reference to coloring or bleach lightening the hair in order to not compromise quality*

EACH BUNDLE OF HAIR IS 3.5 OUNCES EACH. THE AMOUNT OF BUNDLES NEEDED FOR YOUR DESIRED LOOK WILL DEPEND UPON THE LENGTHS AND SOMETIMES YOUR METHOD OF  INSTALL. WE RECOMMEND THIS HAIR FOR EITHER SEW-IN OR U-PART OR FULL WIG INSTALLS. 

PLEASE REFERENCE THE INFORMATION LISTED BELOW FOR THE AMOUNT OF BUNDLES RECOMMENDED ACCORDING TO YOUR PREFERRED LENGTH VARIATIONS.

Any Combinations of lengths 12"-20" = 3 BUNDLES MINIMUM
22"-26" = 4-5 BUNDLES MINIMUM
28"and up = 6 BUNDLES AND UP

Fuller looks desired may require an additional bundle over what we recommend. Leftover hair can always be saved and used later. Hair ships with courtesy care and maintenance product recommendations however, we still recommend referencing your stylist for further information.PLEASE REMEMBER THE LONGER THE LENGTH THE LESS HAIR ON THE ACTUAL WEFT TO EQUAL THE BUNDLE AMOUNT MEASUREMENT WHICH IS APPROXIMATELY 3.2-3.5 OUNCES PER BUNDLE. PURCHASE ACCORDING TO HOW FULL YOU DESIRE YOUR FINISHED INSTALL TO LOOK. Please consult your stylist for further recommendation.

>COWASH AND DEEP CONDITIONING PRIOR TO INITIAL INSTALL HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!<



*** HAIR IN THIS LISTING CURRENTLY ONLY AVAILABLE IN LENGTHS BY INCHES PER BUNDLE AS SHOWN IN THE DROP SELECTION BOX FOR PURCHASE ***

~ Please submit any inquiries about the product along with any questions or concerns prior by contacting us in advance before completing any sales transactions. name: Virgin Brazilian DEEP WAVE CURL ***MOST POPULAR LOW MAINTENANCE CURLY HAIR***
description:
The Karaezy Kouture Virgin Brazilian DEEP WAVE CURL Remy Hair is 100% Virgin Hair and is a long time favorite of long time and return customers of Karaezy Kouture Hair customers. It's high quality top grade unprocessed human hair offered through Karaezy Kouture with a gorgeous wave pattern that has loose curly ends.  The Remy  aligned one directional cuticles prove that this hair can have well up to an entire one year life span minimum and possibly longer when properly cared for and maintained and experiences minimal shedding or tangling! Available in lengths from 14 inches all the way up to 26 inches. This hair is taken directly from donors who have healthy hair that has never been chemically processed in any way. This hair is soft and easy to manage and blends with almost any hair texture no matter if you are relaxed or natural. THIS HAIR IS EXTREMELY TEXTURED and is not recommended if you are looking for a silky sleek look. This is a soft bodied texture and like most  authentic virgin hair  it does require deep conditioning and must be cowashed regularly to free it of dirt and debris that will weight it down and prevent its full styling potential. It is a favorite of both curly and wavy pattern hair lovers.  The hair is reasonably priced...processes and ships within 7-10 business days or less and is sure to become one of your newest favorite curl patterns. Contact Karaezy Kouture with your inquiries and we'd be happy to answer any additional questions you may have before purchasing and then proceed to place your order today!

!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! WE HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS HAIR FOR U-PART OR FULL WIG WITH LACE CLOSURE UNIT INSTALLS. CONTACT FLY HONEY WIGS for the best and most affordable custom unit with the best curl pattern preservation. CONTACT: flyhoneywigs@yahoo.com for a full detailed information attachment.

-THIS HAIR IS AVAILABLE ONLY IN IT'S NATURAL COLOR WHICH IS COMPARABLE TO A 1b-2 IN TYPICAL BEAUTY SUPPLY STORE HAIR. HAIR CAN BE COLORED TO ANY DESIRED COLOR.
*be advised that hair is no longer virgin once colored and must be maintained the same as colored natural hair with color safe deep conditioning care conditioners*

- ALL VIRGIN BRAZILIAN HAIR OFFERED THROUGH KARAEZY KOUTURE CAN BE STRAIGHTENED COMPLETELY AND WILL REVERT AFTER BEING WASHED.
*please keep in mind hair that is completely straightened repeatedly will slightly loosen the wave pattern over time*

-EACH BUNDLE IS 3.5 OUNCES! THE LONGER THE LENGTH THE LESS IN WEFT LENGTH TO MAKE THE BUNDLE THE APPROPRIATE WEIGHT SO COMPENSATE ACCORDINGLY TO YOUR DESIRED LOOK WHEN PURCHASING. ANY FULL HEAD LOOK WITH LENGTHS OVER 18 INCHES  IN THIS PARTICULAR HAIR MAY REQUIRE ADDITIONAL BUNDLES OVER THE STANDARD AMOUNT OF 3 BUNDLES.
YOU MAY REFER TO THE CHART BELOW FOR HOW MANY BUNDLES SHOULD BE PURCHASED ACCORDING TO YOUR DESIRED LENGTHS

14"-18" - 3 BUNDLES MINIMUM
20"-24" - 4 BUNDLES MINIMUM
26" and up - 5 BUNDLES MINIMUM AND UP 

*SEALING YOUR WEFT IS RECOMMENDED FOR PRESERVING THE LONGEVITY OF YOUR VIRGIN HAIR PURCHASE AND HELPS IT WITHSTAND MULTIPLE USE ONLY IF YOU ARE USING THE HAIR IN TRADITIONAL SEW-IN INSTALLATIONS. IT IS NOT ALWAYS NECESSARY FOR THE PREFERRED METHOD OF  U-PART OR FULL WIG INSTALLATION. *

***PLEASE SEE AND BE FAMILIAR WITH OUR FULL PURCHASE POLICY DETAILS AVAILBLE FOR VIEW ONLINE IN THE ABOUT US SECTION AT www.karaezykouture.com***

name: Virgin Peruvian OCEAN WAVE ***Back In Stock***
description:
***BACK BY POPULAR DEMAND***

Our preferred and best selling Virgin Peruvian Ocean Wave is the perfect High Quality Sleek and Textured Wavy Hair. Not too tight but definitely wavy enough to be noticed. Full cuticle one direction strands are healthy, full of body, and curl and color beautifully! This hair looks great straightened, curled with your heat styling tool of choice, or even dry roller set with flexi-rods. Has a beautiful medium natural luster and is not dependent on excessive product use. Just a quality deep condition prior to install and a regular co-wash with good quality products as needed. Keep this hair clean and free of excessive oil and debris and let it be your proud crown and glory.
***FOR ABSOLUTE BEST RESULTS OF THIS HAIR AND ANY OTHER HIGH QUALITY VIRGIN HAIR EXTENSIONS, WE STRONGLY RECOMMEND U-PART AND/OR FULL CUSTOM WIG UNIT INSTALLS TO MAXIMIZE THE LIFE OF THE HAIR AND HELP IT LOOK IT'S ABSOLUTE BEST***

Normal stock for this hair extension option is available in lengths 12"- 30" and 32" and 34" when available and listed below in the selection options.
This chemically unprocessed hair maintains a
beautiful medium luster and natural shine. Hair is
Remy so all cuticles are in tact and aligned in
the same direction so hair has minimal shedding and
is tangle free with proper care and maintenance.
Hair is 100% unprocessed and is AUTHENTIC VIRGIN HAIR available only in it's natural color which can vary from off black to dark brown and sometimes both in one bundle of hair as these natural color inconsistencies can be found in all real virgin hair. Hair can be heat straightened, styled, curled, colored, and/or bleached to preference.

Each bundle of hair is approximately 3.2-3.5 ounces each. The amount of
hair needed for install will vary upon length of hair and the
look you desire and often the method of install you choose. We recommend referring to the general reference below to ensure you purchase enough hair for your desired look. Any unused hair
can always be saved and used later for possible future install and it is always better to have and not need than need and not have.

***CHART BELOW IS STRICTLY FOR REFERENCE ONLY BASED
OFF OUR GENERAL EVALUATION OF THE THICKNESS AND
VOLUME OF THIS HAIR AND IS NOT MANDATORY FOR YOUR
PURCHASE. YOU MAY PURCHASE WHATEVER AMOUNT YOU WISH
BE IT MORE OR LESS. KEEP IN MIND THE AMOUNT OF HAIR
RECOMMENDED FROM US WILL VARY PER PRODUCT BASED OFF
OUR EVALUATION OF HAIR BUNDLES AND THE MINIMUM AMOUNT
NEEDED. AMOUNT NEEDED WILL ALSO DEPEND UPON THE METHOD OF INSTALL AND METHOD OF CLOSURE. THE REFERENCE CHART BELOW GIVES MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS REFERRALS ONLY FOR STANDARD SEW-IN OR WIG UNIT COMPOSITIONS. IF FULLER LOOKS ARE DESIRED YOU CAN PURCHASE MORE HAIR ACCORDING TO PERSONAL PREFERENCE.***

Lengths: 
12"-18" - 3 BUNDLES MINIMUM 
20"-24" - 4 BUNDLES MINIMUM
26"-28" - 5-6 BUNDLES MINIMUM OR MORE AS DESIRED


***PRICES ARE PER  SINGLE BUNDLE  ACCORDING TO THE RESPECTIVE  LENGTH LISTED AND SHOWN***

*At this time there is not a specific closure unit available to match this hair exactly but if you are having a u-part or full wig unit composed by fly honey wigs you may choose our natural or loose wavy closure or any standard natural color wavy closure and it will blend.*

ALL SALES RETURN POLICY AND PAYMENT INFORMATION IS POSTED ON BOTH WEBSITES.

       NEVER HESITATE TO CONTACT US WITH PRODUCT INQUIRIES
*****PLEASE SEE OUR COMPLETE DETAILED ORDER PROCESSING AND SHIPPING POLICIES PRIOR TO COMPLETING ANY  PURCHASE TRANSACTIONS. SUCCESSFUL TRANSACTIONS ARE ASSUMED TO ACCEPTED PROVIDED YOU HAVE MADE YOURSELF FAMILIAR WITH ALL RESPECTIVE INFORMATION PERTAINING TO PURCHASE POLICIES, TERMS AND CONDITIONS. ALL POLICIES AND PROCEDURES ARE STRICTLY ADHERED TO.*****

name: Virgin Brazilian Loose Wavy
description:
NEVER HESITATE TO CONTACT US WITH PRODUCT INQUIRIES
***PLEASE SEE OUR COMPLETE SALES TERMS AND CONDITIONS FOR STORE POLICIES AND PROCEDURES IN THE "ABOUT US" SECTION OF OUR MAIN SITE AT THE DIRECT LINK BELOW
http://www.karaezykouture.com/aboutus.htm


Karaezy Kouture Import Hair Extensions has plenty of options for great HIGH QUALITY HAIR but Virgin Brazilian Loose Wavy is slowly becoming an ALL TIME FAVORITE!
100% UNPROCESSED Virgin Brazilian Remy Hair
in a gorgeous BIG BODY FILLED WAVY CURL PATTERN is available in length options 12 to 28 inches.
This chemically unprocessed hair maintains a
beautiful medium luster and natural shine. Hair is Virgin
Remy so all cuticles are in tact and aligned in
the same direction so hair has minimal shedding and will remain tangle free with proper care and maintenance.

Hair is 100% unprocessed and virgin so it is available only in it's
natural color which is comparable to a combination of dark natural black and the darkest natural to medium brown. Hair can be heat straightened, styled, colored and or bleached to preference.

Each bundle of hair is 3.2-3.5 ounces each. Amount of
hair needed will vary upon length of hair and the
look you desire. We recommend referring to the
general chart reference below to ensure you purchase
enough hair for your desired look. Any unused hair
can always be saved and used at a later time.

***CHART BELOW IS STRICTLY FOR REFERENCE ONLY BASED
OFF OUR GENERAL EVALUATION OF THE THICKNESS AND
VOLUME OF THIS HAIR AND IS NOT MANDATORY FOR YOUR
PURCHASE. YOU MAY PURCHASE WHATEVER AMOUNT YOU WISH
BE IT MORE OR LESS. KEEP IN MIND THE AMOUNT OF HAIR
RECOMMENDED FROM US WILL VARY PER PRODUCT BASED OFF
OUR EVALUATION OF HAIR BUNDLES AND THE MINIMUM AMOUNT
NEEDED ALSO WILL VARY DEPENDING UPON THE METHOD OF
INSTALL AND CLOSURE. THE REFERENCE CHART BELOW GIVES
MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS REFERRALS ONLY. IF FULLER LOOKS ARE DESIRED YOU CAN PURCHASE MORE HAIR ACCORDING TO
PREFERENCE.***

Lengths: 12"-18" - 3 BUNDLES MINIMUM
20"-24" - 4 BUNDLES MINIMUM
26"-28" - 5-6 BUNDLES MINIMUM OR MORE AS DESIRED

Hair is virgin so it is available in it's natural off
black or darkest brown color which is comparable to 1B -2. Sometimes both variations of off black and darkest brown color can be seen in the same bundle of hair and inconsistent natural color variations can be expected in any AUTHENTIC VIRGIN HAIR. This hair can be colored darker or bleached lighter to preference. Please consult professional for proper coloring procedures in
order to not compromise hair quality.

Matching High Quality Loose Wavy Lace Closures are available in lengths 10 inches to 16 inches in size 4x4 made with durable tinted transparent lace with natural hairline, moderate baby hairs, and freestyle parting.
(Most lace closures in this particular style do not have PU border edge making them ideal for custom wig and u-part wig composition.)

PRICES LISTED BELOW ARE PER LENGTH PER SINGLE BUNDLE AND PER LACE CLOSURE UNIT



*** IMPORTANT NOTE:Please keep in mind that although hair
is tangle free with minimal shedding you are likely
to see a few normal strands in the hair's
natural shed process over time and particularly when you shampoo or co-wash hair regularly. THERE IS NO SUCH THING AS HAIR THAT DOES NOT SHED AT ALL! Real hair sheds daily and since this is REAL HAIR it will lose a few strands here and there. You minimize shedding by choosing to seal wefts (optional but not mandatory), keeping hair clean and properly conditioned regularly. Not allowing the hair to dry out completely by maintaining its moisture with a few drops of quality weightless argan oil. DO NOT WEIGHT THIS HAIR DOWN WITH EXCESSIVE PRODUCTS AND OIL SHEEN IS NOT NEEDED! Expect
curl patterns to slightly loosen over extended time
frames as hair ages and if ever hair is completely
straightened you cannot expect it to revert exactly
the same. Curl and Wave patterns maintain best when
worn and maintained in their curly/wavy state. If you
wish to keep and maintain tighter and more defined
curly and wavy patterns please refrain from heat
altering hair curl pattern often and use other alternative to reinforce wave patterns like flexi-rods. We recommend separating this hair into sections and plaiting or braiding it down at night before bed to keep wave pattern in tact and prevent tangling or matting while sleeping. Please also cover hair with a silk or satin sleep bonnet or scarf.
PLEASE REGISTER AND JOIN OUR MAIN SITE AT www.karaezykouture.com TO ACCESS OUR BLOG FOR MORE EDUCATIONAL INFORMATION ON VIRGIN HAIR, CARE AND MAITENANCE, AND STYLIST REFERRALS WITH IMAGE GALLERIES AND PLEASE BE SURE TO LOOK US UP BY NAME (Karaezy Kouture) AND LIKE OUR FACEBOOK PAGE TO KEEP UP WITH PRODUCT ALERTS AND SALES FIRST!

< < < NEVER HESITATE TO CONTACT US WITH PRODUCT INQUIRIES
*****PLEASE SEE OUR COMPLETE SALES TERMS AND CONDITIONS FOR STORE POLICIES AND PROCEDURES IN THE "ABOUT US" SECTION OF OUR MAIN SITE AT THE DIRECT LINK BELOW
http://www.karaezykouture.com/aboutus.htm

description:

This Beautiful Virgin Single Donor Remy Hair is absolutely gorgeous and is of SU)PERIOR QUALITY! Hair has Remy Live single direction cuticles in tact, is soft, full of body, and is thick and full. It has MINIMAL SHEDDING AND IS TANGLE FREE WITH PROPER CARE AND MAINTENANCE! Weft is neat and well constructed.  Hair is 100% Virgin meaning not chemically processed in any way. Hair can be straightened, curled, colored, bleached or heat styled in anyway.

>Hair can be reused up to 1 year when properly cared for or totally maximized for possible longer wear when you choose the preferred method of install via U-part or Full Wig Unit<

*****This hair is currently only available in the lengths listed below and only available in NATURAL COLOR ONLY. This Natural Straight Remy hair is comparable to a 1B- 2 blend  in comparison to beauty supply store hair. Since hair is 100% virgin unprocessed the natural colors variations within the hair will be inconsistent which is also a common trait in AUTHENTIC Virgin Hair ***** PLEASE KEEP IN MIND YOU CAN COLOR AND OR BLEACH THE HAIR TO COLOR PREFERENCE. *Please consult a professional or experienced person in reference to coloring or bleach lightening the hair in order to not compromise quality*

EACH BUNDLE OF HAIR IS APPROXIMATELY 3.2 - 3.5 OUNCES EACH. THE AMOUNT OF BUNDLES NEEDED FOR YOUR DESIRED LOOK WILL DEPEND UPON THE LENGTHS. PLEASE REFERENCE THE INFORMATION LISTED BELOW FOR THE AMOUNT OF BUNDLES RECOMMENDED.

Any Combinations of lengths 12"-18" = 3 BUNDLES MINIMUM
                                              20"-24" = 4 BUNDLES MINIMUM
                                              26"and up = 5-6 BUNDLES AND UP

 Fuller looks desired may require an additional bundle over what we recommend. Leftover hair can always be saved and used later. Hair ships with courtesy care and maintenance product recommendations however, we still recommend referencing your stylist for further information.PLEASE REMEMBER THE LONGER THE LENGTH THE SHORTER THE WEFT FOR THE HAIR TO MEASURE ACCORDING TO THE 3.2-3.5 OUNCES PER BUNDLE SIZE. PURCHASE ACCORDING TO HOW FULL YOU DESIRE YOUR FINISHED INSTALL TO LOOK. Please consult your stylist for further recommendation.

>COWASH AND DEEP CONDITIONING PRIOR TO INITIAL INSTALL IS MANDATORY FOR MAX POTENTIAL AND BEST PERFORMANCE OF THIS HAIR AND ALL VIRGIN HAIR EXTENSIONS<
 

~ Please submit any inquiries about the product along with any questions or concerns prior by contacting us in advance before completing any sales transactions.  We will be MORE THAN HAPPY TO ANSWER ANY QUESTIONS AND ASSIST YOU IN ANY POSSIBLE WAY! ***PLEASE REMEMBER  TO CONTACT US here or our main website if you have any product inquiries, questions, or care and/or maintenance concerns.

name: JUST LACE CLOSURES (Body Wave - Loose Wavy - Natural Straight - Textured Straight)
description:
Our high quality virgin hair lace closures are available for purchase in "LOOSE WAVY", "BODY WAVE", and "NATURAL STRAIGHT", and " SILK BODY WAVE". All closures offered by Karaezy Kouture Import Hair Extensions are assumed to be in standard stock size of 4x4 or 4x3.5 unless noted otherwise. All closures are made of 100% unprocessed virgin hair in it's natural color and can be dyed, bleached, curled, and/or straightened. Closures are made of durable transparent lace with freestyle parting and have a density of approximately 120%.

All current Lace Closures listed here are approximately size 4x4 or size 4x3.5 and come with light brown transparent lace and unbleached knots. Knots bleach easy and when done correctly allowing you to fully customize your install for a totally natural look! Length availability and price per length is listed in purchase selection drop box below. These closures are ideal for closing multiple different install techniques. Care for them as you would your virgin weft extensions and real hair and be careful to treat your lace base with extra care as to not damage or tear it during handling, storing, installation, removal,  and care maintenance.

>>>*NOTE: LACE CLOSURES ARE AVAILABLE IN MATCHING/COORDINATING TEXTURES AND CURL PATTERNS FOR ALL WEFT HAIR EXTENSIONS ARE ALSO LOCATED WITHIN THE WEFT EXTENSION HAIR LISTING AS AN ALTERNATE LOCATION AND THERE IS NO DIFFERENCE IN THE PRODUCT.*

***ALL STORE PURCHASE POLICIES, AND NORMAL ORDER PROCESSING, SHIPPING, AND ARRIVAL TIMES APPLY TO SINGLE CLOSURE PURCHASES THE SAME AS WHEN PURCHASED WITH WEFT EXTENSIONS. TO VIEW OUR FULL DETAILED PURCHASE, RETURN, AND EXCHANGE POLICIES PLEASE CLICK THE PURCHASE AND SHIPPING POLICY TABS ON THIS WEBSITE OR VISIT www.karaezykouture.com AND CLICK THE "ABOUT US" SECTION. PLEASE BE FAMILIAR WITH STORE POLICIES AND MAKE ALL PRODUCT INQUIRIES PRIOR TO COMPLETION OF SALES TRANSACTIONS. YOU MAY CONTACT US USING THIS WEBSITE'S CONTACT OPTION AT ANYTIME.***

name: WEFT SEALER
description:
Preserve and extend the life of your HIGH QUALITY AFFORDABLE Virgin Hair Extensions from Karaezy Kouture IMPORT HAIR EXTENSIONS by sealing your wefts to reduce the already minimal shedding and maintain density for multiple traditional sewn installs. Weft Sealing is usually not needed for u-part or full wig installs but is totally optional. Our bottle of weft sealer is 0.5 fluid ounces, goes on clear and transparent and comes in a lightweight bottle easy to hold and a  bottle cap brush for clean quick application and fast drying.

Color: CLEAR

Size: 0.5 fl.oz. Each

options.name: EASY TRACK WEFT SEALER 0.5 fl oz. (CLEAR)
